description.zh-cn: 由卫拉特蒙古准噶尔部所建立的汗国政权，是人类史上最后一个游牧帝国。其疆域曾西起巴尔喀什湖，东达吐鲁番，于18世纪末被清朝摧毁。
description.en: A khanate established by the Dzungar tribe of the Oirat Mongols, it was the last nomadic empire in history. Its territory once stretched from Lake Balkhash in the west to Turpan in the east, and it was destroyed by the Qing Dynasty in the late 18th century.

description.zh-cn: 准噶尔汗国建立者，首任浑台吉。
description.en: Founder of the Dzungar Khanate and its first Khong Tayiji.

description.zh-cn: 准噶尔汗国统治者，是准噶尔统治者中唯一一位称汗者。他大幅扩张了汗国版图，并与清朝康熙帝长期交战。
description.en: A ruler of the Dzungar Khanate, and the only one among its rulers to hold the title of Khan. He significantly expanded the khanate's territory and engaged in prolonged warfare with the Kangxi Emperor of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 噶尔丹的侄子，接替其成为准噶尔部台吉，使准噶尔部重新强大。
description.en: Galdan's nephew, who succeeded him as the Tayiji of the Dzungar tribe and restored its power.

description.zh-cn: 准噶尔汗国后期领袖，被清军击败后投降，后被乾隆帝赦免并封为亲王。
description.en: A late leader of the Dzungar Khanate, defeated and surrendered to the Qing army, later pardoned by the Qianlong Emperor and made a prince.

description.zh-cn: 准噶尔汗国末代领袖，在达瓦齐投降后继续反清，兵败后逃入俄罗斯帝国。
description.en: The last leader of the Dzungar Khanate, who continued to resist the Qing after Dawachi's surrender and fled to the Russian Empire after being defeated.

description.zh-cn: 中国的最后一个帝制王朝，与准噶尔汗国长期对峙并最终将其消灭。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty of China, which had a long-standing conflict with and eventually destroyed the Dzungar Khanate.

description.zh-cn: 清朝为平定准噶尔部而发动的一系列战争，最终导致准噶尔汗国灭亡。
description.en: A series of wars launched by the Qing dynasty to pacify the Dzungar tribe, ultimately leading to the demise of the Dzungar Khanate.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第四位皇帝，曾多次亲征噶尔丹。
description.en: The fourth emperor of the Qing dynasty, who personally led multiple expeditions against Galdan.

description.zh-cn: 清朝与准噶尔汗国之间的一场关键战役，清军击败噶尔丹军。
description.en: A key battle between the Qing dynasty and the Dzungar Khanate, where the Qing army defeated Galdan's forces.

description.zh-cn: 清朝与准噶尔汗国之间的一场决定性战役，噶尔丹主力被歼灭。
description.en: A decisive battle between the Qing dynasty and the Dzungar Khanate, resulting in the annihilation of Galdan's main force.

description.zh-cn: 由卫拉特蒙古和硕特部在西藏建立的汗国。
description.en: A khanate established in Tibet by the Khoshut tribe of the Oirat Mongols.

description.zh-cn: 存在于16至17世纪，位于天山南路的蒙古汗国。
description.en: A Mongol khanate that existed from the 16th to the 17th century, located south of the Tian Shan.

description.zh-cn: 巴图尔珲台吉的儿子，在继承准噶尔统治权后被杀。
description.en: Son of Batur Khong Tayiji, who was assassinated after inheriting the rule of the Dzungars.

description.zh-cn: 藏传佛教格鲁派的领袖。
description.en: A leader of the Gelug school of Tibetan Buddhism.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第六位皇帝，其治下清军最终消灭了准噶尔汗国。
description.en: The sixth emperor of the Qing dynasty, under whose reign the Qing army finally destroyed the Dzungar Khanate.

description.zh-cn: 清军在平定准噶尔后对准噶尔人进行的大规模系统性屠杀。
description.en: The systematic mass killing of the Dzungar people by the Qing army after conquering the Dzungar Khanate.

description.zh-cn: 18世纪与准噶尔汗国接壤的帝国，双方曾发生军事冲突。
description.en: An empire bordering the Dzungar Khanate in the 18th century, with which it had military conflicts.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯帝国沙皇，其派遣的远征军曾被准噶尔军队击败。
description.en: Tsar of the Russian Empire, whose expeditionary force was defeated by the Dzungar army.

description.zh-cn: 1720年清朝出兵西藏，驱逐了占据此地的准噶尔军队，并将西藏纳入版图。
description.en: In 1720, the Qing dynasty dispatched troops to Tibet, expelled the Dzungar forces occupying the region, and incorporated Tibet into its territory.

description.zh-cn: 卫拉特蒙古的统治者称号。
description.en: A title for the ruler of the Oirat Mongols.

description.zh-cn: 策妄阿拉布坦之子，准噶尔汗国统治者。
description.en: Son of Tsewang Rabtan, ruler of the Dzungar Khanate.

description.zh-cn: 噶尔丹策零之子，准噶尔汗国统治者。
description.en: Son of Galdan Tseren, ruler of the Dzungar Khanate.

description.zh-cn: 准噶尔汗国统治者。
description.en: Ruler of the Dzungar Khanate.

description.zh-cn: 僧格之子，准噶尔汗国统治者。
description.en: Son of Sengge, ruler of the Dzungar Khanate.

description.zh-cn: 1635年，巴图尔珲台吉即浑台吉位，准噶尔部正式建国。
description.en: In 1635, Batur Khong Tayiji ascended to the position of Khong Tayiji, officially establishing the Dzungar state.

description.zh-cn: 清朝通过准噶尔之役消灭了准噶尔汗国。
description.en: The Qing dynasty eliminated the Dzungar Khanate through the Dzungar–Qing Wars.

description.zh-cn: 清朝发动了准噶尔之役以平定准噶尔部。
description.en: The Qing dynasty launched the Dzungar–Qing Wars to pacify the Dzungar tribe.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝决计亲征，并于1690年至1697年间多次组织大军进攻噶尔丹，最终导致其败亡。
description.en: The Kangxi Emperor decided to personally lead expeditions and organized large armies to attack Galdan multiple times between 1690 and 1697, ultimately leading to his defeat and death.

description.zh-cn: 清军在乌兰布通之战中大败噶尔丹军。
description.en: The Qing army decisively defeated Galdan's forces at the Battle of Ulan Butung.

description.zh-cn: 西路清军在昭莫多大败噶尔丹军。
description.en: The western route of the Qing army inflicted a major defeat on Galdan's forces at Jao Modo.

description.zh-cn: 噶尔丹在与清军作战失败后，其原根据地被侄子策妄阿拉布坦占据。
description.en: After Galdan's defeat in battle against the Qing army, his original base of power was occupied by his nephew, Tsewang Rabtan.

description.zh-cn: 噶尔丹是僧格的异母弟。
description.en: Galdan was the half-brother of Sengge.

description.zh-cn: 僧格是巴图尔珲台吉的儿子。
description.en: Sengge was the son of Batur Khong Tayiji.

description.zh-cn: 噶尔丹是巴图尔珲台吉的儿子。
description.en: Galdan was the son of Batur Khong Tayiji.

description.zh-cn: 按照乾隆帝的旨意，清军在平定准噶尔后对其人民进行了屠杀。
description.en: Following the Qianlong Emperor's orders, the Qing army carried out a massacre of the Dzungar people after pacifying them.

description.zh-cn: 1755年春，清军进军伊犁，达瓦齐兵败被俘。
description.en: In the spring of 1755, the Qing army advanced on Ili, and Dawachi was defeated and captured.

description.zh-cn: 1757年初，清政府再次出兵，击败了阿睦尔撒纳的军队。
description.en: In early 1757, the Qing government dispatched troops again and defeated Amursana's army.

description.zh-cn: 1717年，准噶尔汗国灭亡和硕特汗国。
description.en: In 1717, the Dzungar Khanate conquered the Khoshut Khanate.

description.zh-cn: 1678年，噶尔丹出兵南疆，占领叶尔羌汗国。
description.en: In 1678, Galdan sent troops to Southern Xinjiang and occupied the Yarkent Khanate.

description.zh-cn: 1678年，西藏的五世达赖赐予噶尔丹“博硕克图汗”的称号。
description.en: In 1678, the 5th Dalai Lama of Tibet bestowed the title of 'Boshugtu Khan' upon Galdan.

description.zh-cn: 1716年，准噶尔军队与彼得一世所派的俄军在雅梅什湖交战并将其歼灭。
description.en: In 1716, the Dzungar army fought and annihilated the Russian forces sent by Peter I at Lake Yamyshev.

description.zh-cn: 准噶尔军队击败了彼得大帝为开辟通往印度洋通道所派的军队。
description.en: The Dzungar army defeated the forces sent by Peter the Great, who sought to open a trade route to the Indian Ocean.

description.zh-cn: 1716年，策妄阿拉布坦派兵入侵西藏，并占领了拉萨。
description.en: In 1716, Tsewang Rabtan dispatched troops to invade Tibet and occupied Lhasa.

description.zh-cn: 1720年清朝出兵入藏，赶走了占领当地的准噶尔军。
description.en: In 1720, the Qing dynasty sent troops into Tibet and expelled the Dzungar forces that had occupied the region.

description.zh-cn: 巴图尔珲台吉为准噶尔汗国首任统治者。
description.en: Batur Khong Tayiji was the first ruler of the Dzungar Khanate.

description.zh-cn: 僧格为准噶尔汗国第二任统治者。
description.en: Sengge was the second ruler of the Dzungar Khanate.

description.zh-cn: 噶尔丹为准噶尔汗国第四任统治者。
description.en: Galdan was the fourth ruler of the Dzungar Khanate.

description.zh-cn: 策妄阿拉布坦为准噶尔汗国第五任统治者。
description.en: Tsewang Rabtan was the fifth ruler of the Dzungar Khanate.

description.zh-cn: 策妄阿拉布坦是僧格的儿子。
description.en: Tsewang Rabtan was the son of Sengge.

description.zh-cn: 噶尔丹策零是策妄阿拉布坦的儿子。
description.en: Galdan Tseren was the son of Tsewang Rabtan.

description.zh-cn: 策妄多尔济那木扎尔是噶尔丹策零的儿子。
description.en: Tsewang Dorji Namjal was the son of Galdan Tseren.
